mapper.select: select store_no, store_name, store_address, store_closed, store_open, store_phone, store_status from store where store_no = #{storeNo} and store_status = 'Y'
select ob.bk_no, store_no, ob.bk_status, bk_lct, add_date, bk_title, bk_publish, writer_name from off_book ob join book b on (ob.bk_no = b.bk_no) where store_no = #{storeNo}
select ob.bk_no, store_no, ob.bk_status, bk_lct, add_date, bk_title, bk_publish, writer_name from off_book ob join book b on (ob.bk_no = b.bk_no) where store_no = #{storeNo} order by add_date

select ob.bk_no, ob.store_no, ob.bk_status, bk_lct, add_date, bk_title, bk_publish, writer_name, store_name from off_book ob join book b on (ob.bk_no = b.bk_no) join store s on (ob.store_no = s.store_no) where ob.bk_no = #{bkNo} and ob.store_no = #{storeNo}
select store_no, bk_status, store_name from off_book join store using (store_no) where bk_no = #{bkNo}
